meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 16, 2023 Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Certification of the Non-Profit Housing Organization Process
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the certification process for non-profit housing organizations.

agenda_items.title: Community Water Fluoridation in Dallas, Texas-Part 2
agenda_items.description: Continuation of the discussion on community water fluoridation.
agenda_items.presenter: Sarah Standifer, Sally U. Wright, Dr. Griffin Cole, Dr. John Staniland, Professor Bruce Lanphear

agenda_items.title: FY 2023-2024 Cultural Organizations Program Contracts
agenda_items.description: Discussion on contracts for cultural organizations for the fiscal year.
agenda_items.presenter: Martine Philippe, Glenn Ayars, Julia Hosch

agenda_items.title: Dangerous & Aggressive Dogs Audit and Ordinance Amendments
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the audit and amendments related to dangerous and aggressive dogs.
agenda_items.presenter: Melissa Webber, Paul Ramon, Sandy Castillo
